CustomField.description: Includes efficiency savings by Operations, IT or any Paychex personnel or department. Includes current impacts and impacts if CR is not completed. This should be the average annual savings for the first three years. Penalty savings should NOT be included (include in Risk) but definitive costs can be included (ex. Transaction fees, contract fees, hardware costs, licensing, etc). Note: When calculating wages use the average hourly rate of $38.42
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Average annual savings for the first three years. (ex. Wages @ $38.42/hr, Trans fees, contract fees, hardware, licensing, etc).
0 = no positive cost savings 1 = <$50k per yr 3 = $50k - $100k per yr 5 = >$100k per yr
CustomField.label: Internal Savings
